column4: I am trying to send a video to my friend who is using Windows XP and I have Linux ubuntu. I have to compress the files into an archive in order for them to fit in an e-mail, but can my newly made tar.gz be usable at all on her computer?
You can make it a regular zip file rather than a tarred gzipped file
how do you make a zip file in Linux?
In nautilus ( gnome ) right click it :)
